website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, natural anti-frizz serum that's perfect for curls and won't leave your hair greasy or heavy.
pros: Adds shine and softness while taming frizz
Won't leave your hair greasy or weighed down
cons: A few users have said they don't like the smell, but it dissipates after you put the product in your hair

customer_reviews.title: All day shiny, healthy, pretty, hair.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I curl my hair. It accentuates waves and curls even from just having braids in. Smells absolutely amazing but not a super artificial smell sort of a mellow coconut and berries type fragrance. Makes brittle ends look healthier. Makes hair feel smoother and hold moisture better. I wouldn't use towards the roots of your hair it will look too oily. I have a lot of hair I only need one pump per use. I only use after hair is dry and use a leave in conditioner sometimes before I curl my hair. This makes my hair shiny all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin T Masci

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing!!! I have shoulder length hair that I hit up with a blow dryer at least 4 times a week, I also dye my hair as well. Just one full pump (about the size of a pea) keeps my hair soft, shiny and clean for a couple of days. I just put it on the ends when my hair is wet then comb it through... LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: JNac

customer_reviews.title: Best serum for the price
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a better serum at this price point. Nice smell and all natural. 1-2 pumps or 2-3 on very long/dry hair is all you need. Apply to damp hair and then air dry for soft waves or straighten. My hair is wavy and when I apply this and use a flat iron it stays straight even in humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, LOVE !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, love this stuff. I am a product junkie and have tried EVERYTHING, from the outrageously expensive to drug store brands. I have over-processed, bleach blonde, waist-length hair. This product makes my hair silky soft and frizz free. It shines and bounces, and the results last all day. I wake up without tangles. I will never be without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

customer_reviews.title: No more frizz!
